text: The men's coxless pair competition at the 2018 World Rowing Championships in Plovdiv took place at the Plovdiv Regatta Venue. ==Schedule== The schedule was as follows: {| class="wikitable" ! Date ! Time ! Round |- | Sunday 9 September 2018 || 11:05 || Heats |- | Monday 10 September 2018 || 12:25 || Repechage |- | rowspan=2|Thursday 13 September 2018 || 09:17 || Quarterfinals |- | 15:49 || Semifinals C/D |- | Friday 14 September 2018 || 09:03 || Semifinals A/B |- | rowspan=4|Saturday 15 September 2018 || 09:46 || Final B |- | style=background:lemonchiffon| 11:46 ||style=background:lemonchiffon| Final A |- | 14:53 || Final C |- | 15:41 || Final D |} All times are Eastern European Summer Time (UTC+3) ==Results== ===Heats=== The four fastest boats in each heat advanced directly to the quarterfinals. The remaining boats were sent to the repechage. ====Heat 1==== {|class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" !Rank !Rower !Country !Time !Notes |-bgcolor=ccffcc | 1 | align="left"|Marius Cozmiuc
